Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to notification of victims of crime, including sexual offenses, about the address confidentiality program
Summary: Requires notification of victims of crime, including sexual offenses, about the address confidentiality program.
LawCode: Amd ยง641, Exec L; amd ยง2805-i, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public health law, in relation to providing notification to victims of crime and sexual offense victims about the address confidentiality program
